# 目的
- 创建一个能快速发现资金异动，板块异动，个股异动的A股竞价系统
- 快速定位板块，情绪，资金动向的A股竞价系统
- 类似开盘啦的打扳 - 竞价的板块，但是要求比它要丰富

# 产品页面
- TopN竞价列表，要求根据竞价区间9:15-9:25过程中，topN股票的排名变化，关联可视化展示，能够动态看出个股的资金变化；特别要展示9:15的资金，9:20的资金，9:25的资金
- 昨日涨停股票列表（要求按照连扳高度可视化展示）
- 最近人气核心龙头列表（人工通过后台输入，可视化展示）
- 板块人气变化（人工通过后台输入，可视化展示）

# 产品功能
- 记录竞价9:15-9:20可撤单区间的topN个股票的排名变化，方便发现资金的流量
- 记录竞价9:20-9:25不可撤单区间的topN个股票的排名变化，方便发现资金的真实流向
- 通过以上2个时段的竞价，topN个股的排位变化，快速找出对应的板块走强情况，情绪的变化情况
- 通过核按钮个股的变化，快速找出负反馈最大的方向（板块，情绪）

# 数据架构
- 提前异步获取昨日涨停板情况，存储到数据库
- 读取竞价topN的竞价数据，存储到数据库
- 读取昨天涨停的股票今天竞价时候的数据，存储到数据库

# 技术栈及资源
- 数据库：mysql， 127.0.0.1:3306 root / root， 数据库名称：jingjiabushou(如果没有则创建即可)
- 编程语言：python3
- 框架：flask, vue
- 数据库操作：mysql-connector-python
- 异步操作：asyncio
- 定时任务：apscheduler
- 日志：logging
- 环境：windows11

# 数据源读取
## 下面的请求中的--data-raw内的json数据，是当前股票的所有代码，格式是：0|1.股票代码，0代表上证主板，1代表深证主板，可单独放到一个配置文件中
```
curl 'https://push2dycalc.eastmoney.com/api/qt/ulist.np/post' \
  -H 'Accept: */*' \
  -H 'Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7' \
  -H 'Connection: keep-alive' \
  -H 'Content-type: application/json' \
  -H 'Origin: https://vipmoney.eastmoney.com' \
  -H 'Referer: https://vipmoney.eastmoney.com/' \
  -H 'Sec-Fetch-Dest: empty' \
  -H 'Sec-Fetch-Mode: cors' \
  -H 'Sec-Fetch-Site: same-site' \
  -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/146.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua: "Chromium";v="146", "Not-A.Brand";v="24", "Google Chrome";v="146"' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-platform: "Windows"' \
  --data-raw ## 昨日涨停股票竞价情况
### 异步通过AKShare获取昨日涨停板数据(文档：https://akshare.akfamily.xyz/introduction.html)
### 根据异步获取的涨停板数据，生成昨日涨停板的股票代码列表，用于下面的--data-raw，格式如下面所示
```
curl 'https://push2dycalc.eastmoney.com/api/qt/ulist.np/post' \
  -H 'Accept: */*' \
  -H 'Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7' \
  -H 'Connection: keep-alive' \
  -H 'Content-type: application/json' \
  -H 'Origin: https://vipmoney.eastmoney.com' \
  -H 'Referer: https://vipmoney.eastmoney.com/' \
  -H 'Sec-Fetch-Dest: empty' \
  -H 'Sec-Fetch-Mode: cors' \
  -H 'Sec-Fetch-Site: same-site' \
  -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/146.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua: "Chromium";v="146", "Not-A.Brand";v="24", "Google Chrome";v="146"' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-platform: "Windows"' \
  --data-raw '{"fltt":2,"secids":["0.002131","1.688158","0.000638","0.002951","1.603533","1.603138","0.002248","1.600960","1.600397","1.600821","1.603757","1.600673","1.605018","1.688480","1.605287","1.603950","1.603090","0.001896","1.600589","1.605033","0.002713","0.000711","0.000609","0.000669","0.002364","0.000962","1.603191","1.601231","0.002842","0.002080","0.002498","0.002796","0.002837","0.000533","0.300277","0.300846","1.603688","0.000070","0.002378","0.002885","0.002922","1.601872","1.605006","1.600545","0.000833","1.603256","1.600490","0.000628","1.600481","0.002323","0.002520","0.000767","0.002975","0.002478","1.603088","0.002824","0.002518","1.605318","1.603389","0.002272","0.000820","1.601126","1.601619","1.603308","0.002208","1.603268"],"fields":"f2,f3,f4,f5,f6,f10,f12,f13,f14,f100,f265,f608,f615,f616,f617,f618,f619,f620,f629,f630,f637,f638,f639,f641","fid":"f615","po":1,"pn":1,"pz":100,"ut":"c92c50e6b0fab2c17cd5e276e9a79c42"}'
```

## 按照板块概念获取昨日涨停板票信息
```
curl 'https://app.jiuyangongshe.com/jystock-app/api/v1/action/field' \
  -H 'Accept: application/json, text/plain, */*' \
  -H 'Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7' \
  -H 'Connection: keep-alive' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -b 'SESSION=NzE2YWU3NWQtMTE4Ni00NzA4LTkxMTQtZTFlZWQ1N2NmODI5; Hm_lvt_58aa18061df7855800f2a1b32d6da7f4=1771507606,1771571086; Hm_lpvt_58aa18061df7855800f2a1b32d6da7f4=1771571139' \
  -H 'Origin: https://www.jiuyangongshe.com' \
  -H 'Referer: https://www.jiuyangongshe.com/' \
  -H 'Sec-Fetch-Dest: empty' \
  -H 'Sec-Fetch-Mode: cors' \
  -H 'Sec-Fetch-Site: same-site' \
  -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/146.0.0.0 Safari/537.36' \
  -H 'platform: 3' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua: "Chromium";v="146", "Not-A.Brand";v="24", "Google Chrome";v="146"' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-platform: "Windows"' \
  -H 'timestamp: 1771571177386' \
  -H 'token: c6c97fb4d2a915a10ee8f2b5cdde1c86' \
  --data-raw '{"date":"2026-02-13","pc":1}'
```
